alert.note: Alert for Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 29 at 11:16AM EDT until further notice by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in New Jersey... Saddle River near Lodi affecting Bergen County. .Heavy rain has resulted in rising river and stream levels. For the Saddle River...including Lodi...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saddle River near Lodi. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Flooding in parking lots at the Building Complex along Main Street. Flooding at the back parking lot of CVS, LA Fitness and Fire House. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 7.1 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.1 feet on 05/17/1989. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri 8 pm Sat 4 am Saddle River Lodi 5.5 4.7 Fri 10 am ED 7.1 5.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at midnight EDT.
